title: Riverside Market
description: A historic outdoor market with local crafts, food stalls and weekly live music.

title: Old Town Museum
description: Small local museum showcasing the town's history and cultural artifacts.

title: Sunset Park
description: Community park with river views, playgrounds and picnic areas.

title: Artisan Row
description: A cluster of artisan shops and galleries featuring local creators.

title: Civic Theater
description: Historic performance venue hosting plays, concerts and community events.

title: Harbor Walk
description: Scenic walk along the harbor with benches, sculptures and cafes.

title: Botanical Gardens
description: Botanical display with seasonal plants, greenhouse and a learning center.

title: Mountain View Trail
